analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b2232cf1d4ade3b83092dc231bcf4cbc1b6be49.sol#81-82) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b2232cf1d4ade3b83092dc231bcf4cbc1b6be49.sol#179-214)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b2232cf1d4ade3b83092dc231bcf4cbc1b6be49.sol#294-317)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b2232cf1d4ade3b83092dc231bcf4cbc1b6be49.sol#388-402)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b2232cf1d4ade3b83092dc231bcf4cbc1b6be49.sol#406-423)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b2232cf1d4ade3b83092dc231bcf4cbc1b6be49.sol#487-491) is declared view but contains assembly code

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b2232cf1d4ade3b83092dc231bcf4cbc1b6be49.sol#518-534) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b2232cf1d4ade3b83092dc231bcf4cbc1b6be49.sol#527-531)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/31/0x0b2232cf1d4ade3b83092dc231bcf4cbc1b6be49.sol#455) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/31/0x0b2232cf1d4ade3b83092dc231bcf4cbc1b6be49.sol#492-499)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b2232cf1d4ade3b83092dc231bcf4cbc1b6be49.sol#487-491)
	- /unique_chucks/31/0x0b2232cf1d4ade3b83092dc231bcf4cbc1b6be49.sol#489-491
